wikipedia_page.main: John Francis Fleming (26 August 1881 – 9 January 1965) was a British sport shooter who competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics.In the 1908 Olympics he won a gold medal in the moving target small-bore rifle event and was 9th in the disappearing target small-bore rifle event.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1908 Summer Olympics
